article_title: Time to Consider the Many Borders of Legal Adulthood
article_text:
Your editorial “An Adult on Campus” (Nov. 12) applauds Purdue University President Mitch Daniels’s response to what you call “the children’s revolt at Yale and Missouri.” That is the most apt label for it, especially since under ObamaCare, those students are considered children until they are 26 and legal drinkers at 21. However, they are adults at age 18 for voting purposes, an anomaly that makes zero sense, but has severe repercussions for the real adult population of America.

What we now have is a class of “children”...
